episodes.title: Shadowman 9: In the Cradle of Destiny
episodes.plot: The truths and half-truths about Dr. Venture's former arch nemeses are finally revealed

episodes.title: The Doctor Is Sin
episodes.plot: Dr. Venture learns that a life with no arch enemy is not nearly so sweet

episodes.title: The Invisible Hand of Fate
episodes.plot: At long last, The Venture Bros. peels away the onion-like shrouds of time for a look back into the troubled past of America's most beloved hydrocephalic former boy genius, to reveal dark secrets that even he didn't know about.

episodes.title: Home Is Where the Hate Is
episodes.plot: Dr. Venture receives an unorthodox introduction to his new Guild-assigned nemesis

episodes.title: The Buddy System
episodes.plot: Dr. Venture, in a bid to make some much-needed money, opens up the compound as "Rusty's Day Camp for Boy Adventurers."

episodes.title: Dr. Quymn, Medicine Woman
episodes.plot: Love is in the air, kind of, when Dr. Venture encounters his childhood friend, Dr. Tara Quymn, in the Amazon Rain Forest.

episodes.title: What Goes Down Must Come Up
episodes.plot: Ventures are about to learn the hard way that beneath the foundations of the Venture Compound lie deep, dark secrets.

episodes.title: Tears of a Sea Cow
episodes.plot: The Monarch seeks to re-spark his old hatred by secretly visiting the Venture Compound

episodes.title: Now Museum - Now You Don't!
episodes.plot: Jonas Jr. converts Spider Skull Island into a Team Venture Museum.

episodes.title: The Lepidopterists
episodes.plot: The Monarch launches his first attack on his new arch nemesis, the other Dr. Venture.

episodes.title: ORB
episodes.plot: Brock discovers that his long-standing role as Dr. Venture's bodyguard may not have been the assignment he always thought it was.

episodes.title: The Family That Slays Together, Stays Together: Part 1
episodes.plot: Brock Samson is a marked man.

episodes.title: The Family That Slays Together, Stays Together: Part 2
episodes.plot: Heads will fly as the explosive conclusion of The Venture Bros. two-part season finale finds Brock and the Venture family on the run from the Law, The Monarch, Sgt. Hatred and the entire O.S.I!
